files.patch:
@@ -116,0 +116,10 @@ +

  • FILE

    +

    The following properties are used to configure the handler for URIs with the {@code file://} scheme:

    +
      +

    • {@systemProperty jdk.net.file.ftpfallback} (default: <false>)
      + The {@code file://} handler by default rejects any non-local file URI (as defined by RFC 8089) + as invalid. Setting this property to true enables a legacy feature where + the handler instead opens an FTP connection for such non-local URIs.

      +

      Any modern code should should use explicit FTP URIs instead and not rely on + enabling this legacy FTP fallback feature.

      +
